title: 2stout
author: 2stout
created_time: December 08, 2023, 06:46:53 PMLast edit: December 27, 2023, 12:28:25 AM by 2stout
content: To spread some Holiday cheer during the Holiday season, I am going to do what I call a 13 for 13. ¬†Think of it as a play on the 12 days of Xmas with there being 13 days of once daily free raffles, starting on 13 Dec with the 13th and final raffle being on Xmas day, 25 Dec. ¬†Subject to change but 11 of these will be new, unloaded Ballet wallets. ¬†Items will be shipped to MJ, so if you win you will need to arrange reship with him.Winners so far:Day 1: ¬†Bd officerDay 2: ¬†GazetaBitcoinDay 3: ¬†anonymousminerDay 4: ¬†YodasRedRocketDay 5: ¬†mx12.levinsDay 6: ¬†PeakDK Day 7: ¬†RemsjackDay 8: ¬†owlcatz (via mx12.levins)Day 9: ¬†NeuroticFishDay 10: ¬†bestcoin_59Day 11: ¬†examplensDay 12: ¬†5tiftDay 13: ¬†anonymousminer
